sn55.31:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.31:1.5: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.31:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.31:2.2: svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo …pe… paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
sn55.31:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.31:3.2: suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho …pe… anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti.
sn55.31:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.31:4.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā”ti.
